mapper.insert:
INSERT IGNORE INTO tb_food_backup( food_code, food_name, food_group, food_gram, food_calorie, food_carbo, food_protein, food_fat, food_sodium, food_cholesterol, food_sugar, food_makerName, food_reg_date ) VALUES
("${food.foodCode}", "${food.foodName}", "${food.foodGroup}", "${food.foodTotalGram}", "${food.foodCal}", "${food.foodCarbo}", "${food.foodProtein}", "${food.foodFat}", "${food.foodSugar}", "${food.foodSodium}", "${food.foodChole}", "${food.makerName}", NOW() )
